ValidationRule.description: The Validation Rule is to avoid duplicate values on Geography Name.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(ISNEW(), IF( UPPER(Name) == UPPER(VLOOKUP($ObjectType.Geography__c.Fields.Name,$ObjectType.Geography__c.Fields.Name, Name)),true , false), AND(ISCHANGED(Name), IF( UPPER(Name) == UPPER(VLOOKUP($ObjectType.Geography__c.Fields.Name,$ObjectType.Geography__c.Fields.Name, Name)),true,false)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This name already exists. Geography Name should be unique.
